text: Omar Almeida Quintana (born 1981) is a Cuban chess Grandmaster. Almeida Quintana became a Grandmaster in 2006. He is the 6th best chess player in Cuba (May 2020). In 2010 he tied for 1st-2nd with Azer Mirzoev at Albacete. == References == == External links == * Category:1981 births Category:Chess grandmasters Category:North American chess biography stubs Category:Living people Category:Cuban chess players
title: Omar Almeida Quintana
